feed.title: PortChecker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v1.0.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix codeQL badge in README in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/20
  • Various style improvements in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/26
  • Bump babel-preset-react-app from 10.0.0 to 10.0.1 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/25
  • Update docker-compose for production to use GitHub container registry in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/28
  • Bump eslint from 8.4.1 to 8.5.0 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/27
  • Bump @babel/core from 7.16.0 to 7.16.5 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/24
  • Bump terser-webpack-plugin from 5.2.5 to 5.3.0 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/29
  • Bump @babel/preset-react from 7.16.0 to 7.16.5 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/22
  • Bump cssnano from 5.0.12 to 5.0.14 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/30
  • Bump @emotion/babel-plugin from 11.7.1 to 11.7.2 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/32
  • Bump node-sass from 7.0.0 to 7.0.1 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/33
  • Bump webpack-dev-server from 4.6.0 to 4.7.3 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/40
  • Bump eslint-plugin-react from 7.27.1 to 7.28.0 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/42
  • Bump @babel/preset-env from 7.16.4 to 7.16.8 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/39
  • Bump postcss-preset-env from 7.0.1 to 7.2.3 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/43
  • Bump @babel/core from 7.16.5 to 7.16.7 in /webui in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/44
  • Upgrade all dependencies in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/45
  • v1.0.11 release in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/46
  • Merge to master in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/47

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v1.0.10...v1.0.11

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: 2.0.0b
entry.content:
Rewrites the front-end to a single page HTML instead of React. This is an incredibly small and simple application, so maintaining the various dependencies that come with a React site is a bit overkill.

The backend API is also refactored to move away from using AWS Lambda functions. The usage and popularity of this site is absolutely fantastic, but also quite unexpected. There have been numerous overage fees within the AWS free-tier limits, which is not sustainable without donations from users.

I see discussions related to portchecker.io, and some users have asked about self hosting. The changes made here also means that this project is more portable/not vendor locked in and only requires Docker to run.

As always, feedback and recommendations are more than welcomed!

Please consider the rewritten front-end and API as a beta release.

What's Changed

  • Refactor both front-end and backend to make app more simple and portable by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/184
  • Cleanup directories by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/185

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v1.0.10...2.0.0b
